author: Rob Peterson
comment: This is exactly what I have been looking for.  An app that is not a FACE to show me my phones Battery%.  I can't count how many times my phone in in my pocket or bag while biking  or another room and I want to know if it needs charging.   Finally I can check my battery while riding my bike to see if I have enough to battery to stream music for the rest of my trip or if I need to stop streaming.  *small bug, sometimes it shows 0% battery and I have to close then re-open it to see actual percentage.

author: Joel Houston
comment: I've been looking for just thing for a long time. Thank you so much for making it! It said 0% when I first opened it, but when I reopened it, the correct status was displayed. Thanks again!

author: Carlito Diego Gavin
comment: It would be nice if this actually worked... Most of the time it doesn't...

author: Ola Stensson
comment: Simple app, does exactly what I want. Great job!

author: Chris Heald
comment: Does exactly what it says (and what I needed!)
title: As advertised

author: Team USA
comment: At first give it a few mins to sync
title: A++
